patthana15.3:4.1: Hetuṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.3:5.1: Hetuṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.3:6.1: Nahetuṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
